page.title: 01THE ISLAND OF PAPA STRONSAY
page.content: Papa Stronsay is a small island. During most summers and some winters a family lives there. The familys only source of power is two generators. They look after their sheep. When they are not living there some men come across every so often to check the sheep. There are two derelict houses of which one used to be a school house. On Papa Stronsay there are two piers and a light house. The island has one nice beach. Before the war during the herring season Papa Stronsay was a busy community. Now the only thing that remains to show this is am empty filleting station. There is a light house on Papa Stronsay which is maintained by people who go out every so often to paint and maintain it.
